    • Product

      public Product​(java.sql.Connection connection, int id) throws Product.NotFoundException, java.sql.SQLException
      Construct a new Product of the provided id and load the rest of its properties from a database.
      Parameters:
      connection - database connection
      id - id of the product
      Throws:
      Product.NotFoundException - the product of this particular id is not in the database
      java.sql.SQLException - SQL error

      public void loadImageFromDbToFile​(java.sql.Connection connection, java.lang.String filename) throws java.sql.SQLException, Product.NotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Load an image of the product from a database and save it to a local file.
      Parameters:
      connection - database connection
      filename - file title where to save the image
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - SQL error
      Product.NotFoundException - the product of this particular id is not in the database
      java.io.IOException - I/O error

    • saveImageToDbFromFile

      public void saveImageToDbFromFile​(java.sql.Connection connection, java.lang.String filename) throws java.sql.SQLException, Product.NotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Load an image of the product from a local file and save it in a database.
      Parameters:
      connection - database connection
      filename - file title where to load the image from
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - SQL error
      Product.NotFoundException - the product of this particular id is not in the database
      java.io.IOException - I/O error

    • findTheMostSimilar

      public Product findTheMostSimilar​(java.sql.Connection connection, double weightAC, double weightCH, double weightPC, double weightTX) throws java.sql.SQLException, Product.NotFoundException
      Find a product with the most similar image to the current product based on several criteria.
      Parameters:
      connection - database connection
      weightAC - average color criteria
      weightCH - color histogram criteria
      weightPC - positional color criteria
      weightTX - texture criteria
      Returns:
      object of the found product
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - SQL error
      Product.NotFoundException - the suitable product is not in the database
